name: Goodnight, MiMi!
description:
Goodnight, MiMi. Have a nice rest...

Help MiMi navigate their weird, zero-gravity dreamscape so they can have a good night's sleep. Cling to walls, weave through moving obstacles and avoid powerful fans to make it to the end. Definitely no pain and/or heartache ahead.

UPDATE -- THE GAME IS FIXED!! The game is completely operational and works exactly as intended.

It was 5am in Sydney when we were done (the jam finished at 9am), and we left some bugs. All bugs have been fixed in a new build of the game, but we cannot upload it until the Ludwig Jam is over. Please understand!

This project will be great for all of our portfolios, so we'll refine it even after the jam ends!

Credits

Xander Akkari - Programming, menu music, heavy lifting

hikimango - Art direction, sprites, level design

Erik Mendon - Sprites, sounds

Kane Novak - Pigeon model

Button prompts by Xelu (completely free for commercial use) - https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
